Kim Il Sung's work published in booklet in Cuba 
     Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A celebrated work of the  President Kim Il Sung "On the Three Principles of National Reunification" was brought out in booklet by the Academia Publishing House of Cuba on March 27.

articles.content:
Juche 89-90 plan signed between Korea and Russia 
     Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA -- A Juche 89-90 (2000-2001) plan for cultural and scientific exchange between the governments of the DPRK and the Russian Federation was signed in Pyongyang  today.
  Present at the signing ceremony on the Korean side were officials concerned and on the opposite side were members of the delegation for discussing and signing the plan for cultural exchange, the Russian ambassador to Korea and embassy officials.

articles.title: Senior party officials meet foreign guests
articles.content:
Senior party officials meet foreign guests 
    Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, alternate politburo member and secretary of the central committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, today met and had a conversation with Darrel Chandra Raja Collure, general secretary of the central committee of the Sri Lanka Communist Party.
   Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the WPK central committee, met and had a conversation with the delegation of the People's Party of Cambodia led by Ney Pena, vice-chairman of the control committee of the party, who is also member of the standing commission of the central committee of the party.
